modName: The Matherian Viking Shields Set II - The 13th Warrior Viking Camp Edition
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/logo2.png[/IMG]

by

+ Mather the Bec +

(VER 2.0)





[IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/paragrafonew.png[/IMG]


[SIZE=3][B][I]
This new modification will add :[/I][/B][/SIZE] 
[B][I] [/I][/B] 
[SIZE=3]- [B][I]A [/I][/B][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]New VIKING OUTPOST [/I][/B][/COLOR][B][I]to the northern side of [COLOR=#ff0000]DAWNSTAR[/COLOR] ;[/I][/B][/SIZE] 
[B][I] [/I][/B] 
[SIZE=3]- [B][I]New NPCs and stuff from [/I][/B][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]THE 13th WARRIOR [/I][/B][/COLOR][B][I]movie ;[/I][/B][/SIZE] 
[B][I] [/I][/B] 
- [SIZE=3][B][I]A New set of [/I][/B][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]76 [/I][/B][/COLOR][B][I]historically accurate[/I][/B][B][I] [COLOR=#4bacc6]Viking[/COLOR] / [COLOR=#339966]Anglo-Saxon[/COLOR] / [COLOR=#800000]Roman-Britain[/COLOR] / [COLOR=#ff00ff]Rus [/COLOR][/I][/B][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][B][I]		   wooden shields[/I][/B][/SIZE] 
[SIZE=3][B][I] [/I][/B][/SIZE] 
[SIZE=3][B][I]to your Skyrim gameplay [/I][/B][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]experience[/I][/B][/COLOR][B][I].[/I][/B][/SIZE] 


[I]-> PLEASE REFER TO THE PDF MANUAL FOR MORE DETAILS <-[/I]



[IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/paragrafodescription.png[/IMG]
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][/B] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=6][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/buliwyftrono.png[/IMG][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][/B][/FONT] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][SIZE=6][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/vikingheader3L.png[/IMG][COLOR=#4bacc6]A Viking Tale [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/FONT][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/vikingheader3R.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][/B][/FONT] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][I][SIZE=6]I[/SIZE][/I][/B][B][I][SIZE=3]n my story, Buliwyf never died.[/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][FONT=Calibri]In my story, the chief of the legendary Viking fellowship who survived the final battle against the Wendols, who crushed the “Horns of Power” and saved Hrothgar’s kingdom from the final annihilation, was miraculously cured of the lethal Wendol Mother poison and finally crowned King.[/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][FONT=Calibri]Nevertheless, the threat of a new massive Wendol invasion wasn’t totally eliminated.[/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][FONT=Calibri]Some months later, a new message from Mather “the Blacksmith” (cousin of Buliwyf) deeply shook the foundations of the new realm.[/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][SIZE=3]New rumors from the West told about a huge, frightening army of Wendol horsemen reaching the legendary land of Skyrim across the winter sea ice ...[/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][/FONT][/I][/B] [/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][/FONT][/I][/B] [/CENTER]

[CENTER][I]-> CONTINUED ON PDF MANUAL <-[/I][/CENTER]



[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/campocornice.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][SIZE=6][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/vikingheader3L.png[/IMG][COLOR=#4bacc6]The Camp[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/FONT][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/vikingheader3R.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][/B][/FONT] [/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][SIZE=6]T[/SIZE][SIZE=3]he “Mather’s Viking Camp” rises on a small island outside Dawnstar. [/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][/FONT][/I][/B] [/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][/FONT][/I][/B] [/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][SIZE=3]This full living Viking Outpost was settled on a perfect strategic position and is well protected by an ancient Imperial Tower.In this further place, the last survivors of the legendary Norman fellowship will welcome the mighty Dragonborn as an old friend.[/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][/FONT][/I][/B] [/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][/FONT][/I][/B] [/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][I][FONT=Calibri,sans-serif][SIZE=3][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][SIZE=6][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/vikingheader3L.png[/IMG][COLOR=#4bacc6]The Characters[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/FONT][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/vikingheader3R.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Calibri][B][/B][/FONT] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/buliwyf2.png[/IMG][IMG]http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2urv7PSZZ1qhgf4do7_250.gif[/IMG]
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/madr2.png[/IMG][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/madrgif.png[/IMG]
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/ibn2.png[/IMG][IMG]http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2urv7PSZZ1qhgf4do6_250.gif[/IMG]
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/herger2.png[/IMG][IMG]http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2urv7PSZZ1qhgf4do2_250.gif[/IMG]
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/weath2.png[/IMG][IMG]http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2urv7PSZZ1qhgf4do5_250.gif[/IMG]
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/edgtho2.png[/IMG][IMG]http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2urv7PSZZ1qhgf4do4_250.gif[/IMG]
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][I]-> PLEASE REFER TO THE PDF MANUAL FOR MORE DETAILS <-[/I][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/paragrafoinstallation.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffff00][FONT=Arial Black][B][I][SIZE=4]THE MVSS II DOESN\'T REQUIRE ANY DLC OR MOD[/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Arial Black][B][I][SIZE=5]IF YOU ALREADY INSTALLED THE FIRST RELEASE [/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Arial Black][B][I][SIZE=5]OF MVSS[/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Arial Black][B][I][SIZE=5](VER. 1.0)[/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]


[CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][FONT=Calibri]and in order to prevent any kind of conflict with this new version of the mod, [/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#c00000][B][I][SIZE=3][FONT=Calibri]I heartily recommend to :[/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffffff][SIZE=2]1) COMPLETELY UNINSTALL the previous version by Nexus Mod Manager (NMM);
[/SIZE] 
[SIZE=2]2) make sure the esp file “+ MATHERIAN_VIKING_SHIELDS_SET +.esp” was actually removed from your Skyrim DATA folder[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ffffff][/COLOR] 
[COLOR=#ffffff][SIZE=2]3) proceed with a fresh installation of MVSS II.[/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Arial Black][B][I][SIZE=5]BE CAREFUL !!! [/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Arial Black][B][I][SIZE=5]YOUR OLD SHIELDS WON’T BE PRESERVED WITH NEW INSTALLATION OF THE MOD.[/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]


[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/endorse.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=#ffff00][FONT=Arial Black][B][I][SIZE=4]IF YOU REALLY LIKED THE MVSS II, DON\'T FORGET TO COME BACK TO THIS PAGE AND SHOW YOUR APPRECIATION BY CLICKING ON \"ENDORSE ME\" BUTTON ;)[/SIZE][/I][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]



[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/paragrafopermissions.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


[CENTER][B][I]If you want to include any part of The 

MVSS II (13th warrior Viking camp edition)

in your own mod project, 

please contact me at : [/I][/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][SIZE=6][COLOR=#ffff00][I]Matherthebec@gmail.com[/I][/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][I]If you want to show your appreciation to the mod, you can make a donation to this Paypal account :[/I][/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4bacc6][I]mather6@libero.it[/I][/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][I]Any will be largely appreciated :)[/I][/B][/CENTER]


[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/cornice_perfect_viking2.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/paragrafoperfectviking.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][I]In order to change your Skyrim experience into a TRUE “Viking” one,[/I][/B][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][I]here’s a list of mods that will help you to get this effect : [/I][/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092][IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12092-1-1335454819.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1002][IMG]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/70110-1323793732.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#f79646][SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3947]\"Raider Helmet”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#f79646][SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13462]\"NorseViking Chainmail”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ac7b3e][SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14085]\"Faal Sizaan - Ancient Nordic Longbow”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ac7b3e][SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4793]\"CONAN THE BARBARIAN outfits”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12506][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aSN9A.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26321][IMG]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/NorthmanArmours.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#ac7b3e][SIZE=6][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26852]\"Northman Knight Helm Retextured - Valsgarde”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037][IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/14037-1-1336401591.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950][IMG]http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/594721538820898722/D15E872DC567CF56963E60A6BE0222F451B960B9/268x268.resizedimage[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER]




[CENTER][IMG]http://www.mtwitalia.it/Mods/MVSS/paragraficredits3.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][I]A special thanks to :[/I][/B][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#f79646][SIZE=5][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3253396]Redxavier[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[CENTER][B][I]Who generously gave his permission to use parts from :[/I][/B][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#f79646][SIZE=4][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7328]\"Witcher 2 Shield Pack\"[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[CENTER][B][I]&[/I][/B][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#f79646][SIZE=4][CENTER][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3947]\"Raider Helmet”[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR]
